front.title: An LDAPv3 Schema for X.509 Certificates

abstract.t: This document describes an LDAP schema which can be used to implement a certificate store for X.509 certificates. Specifically, a structural object class for a X.509 certificate is defined. Key fields of a certificate are stored in LDAP attributes so that applications can easily retrieve the certificates needed by using basic LDAP search filters. Multiple certificates for a single entity can be stored and retrieved.
